settings.title: How long does it take to process my order?
settings.answer:
Please allow 24-48 hours for your order to be processed and fulfilled. This process may take slightly longer during periods of high order volume.

If an order is placed with Overnight or 2-3 Day shipping before 12 pm PT Mon-Fri, it will be fulfilled the same day. If it is placed after 12 pm PT, it will be fulfilled the next business day.

settings.title: How can I track my order?
settings.answer: Once your order has been placed, we will send a confirmation email immediately and follow up with a shipping notification and tracking number. Please note that all shipping labels take a moment to update.

settings.title: What method of payment is accepted?
settings.answer: Visa, MasterCard, Discover, American Express, and PayPal.

settings.title: What are the shipping options?
settings.answer: We offer complimentary standard shipping. Orders for expedited (2-3 day) or next-day shipping, which are available for an additional charge, must be placed by 12 p.m. PT; orders placed after 12 p.m. PT will ship on the next business day.

settings.title: Do you offer international shipping?
settings.answer: Unfortunately at this time we do not offer international shipping.

settings.title: Do you cover duties/tax for international shipments?
settings.answer: All international orders are subject to duties and taxes billed by the destination country’s customs department. The recipient must bear any additional charges for customs clearance.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: Unworn and unused merchandise accompanied by the original purchase receipt can be returned or exchanged within 14 days of delivery.

settings.title: How do I process a return?
settings.answer: In the event you need to process a return, please email orders@groverrad.com within 7 days of delivery.

settings.title: How long will my refund take?
settings.answer: Once your package reaches the warehouse, please allow 3 to 7 business days (depending on peak times) for your return to be processed. When your return has been accepted, your refund will be issued and you will receive a confirmation email.

settings.title: Where are the clothes made?
settings.answer: All garments are made in Los Angeles with independent local tailors and seamstresses. We only work with factories with the highest ethical standards.

settings.title: Where do you source your material?
settings.answer: Most material is sourced within the United States with the exception of our scarf silk sourced from Italy.

settings.title: What makes your clothes sustainable?
settings.answer: We are considered 'slow fashion'. We do not have any dead inventory and everything is made in low quantities with natural organic materials that are built to last.
